code:
[BEGIN]
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic j,
    input logic k,
    output logic Q
);

    logic Qold;

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        Qold <= Q; // Capture the old state of Q
        case ({j, k})
            2'b00: Q <= Qold;      // Qold
            2'b01: Q <= 1'b0;      // Reset
            2'b10: Q <= 1'b1;      // Set
            2'b11: Q <= ~Qold;     // Toggle
        endcase
    end

    assign Q = Qold; // This line is incorrect and should be removed

endmodule
```
[DONE]
